ResearchProjectDef.label: Phyto-Organics
ResearchProjectDef.description: By utilizing spacer componenets and Fibril fibers, a surrogate (and parasitic!) limb or organ can be created. Side Effects include: increased caloric consumption, feelings of hunger, slight discomfort at install site and increased presence of bugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phytotech
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of how to use Fibril to create technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phyto-Tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: For use ONLY with approved Phytotech brand heavy equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phyto-Guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Farm defense has never been so easy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phyto-neurology
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying the way Enargo energises tissue and Fibril interacts with biology, we can develop an arsenal of implants.
